com.nickeson.learning

Class GravityCalc

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nickeson.learning.GravityCalc

  • public class GravityCalc
extends java.lang.Object
    Title: GravityCalc.java

    Project: LearningProject1

    Description: An earth gravity calculator that computes final position and velocity, given intitial position, velocity and fall time

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2016

    Company: Silicon Mountain Technologies

    Since:
    Apr 11, 2016

    updates:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    nickeson

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      double GRAVITY
      Gravity is constant on earth at -9.8 (m/s)/s

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void businessLogic()
      Method to use specific instance of GravityCalc, run posCalc and veloCalc on that instance, and output results to console
      double getFallTime()
      Returns the object's fall time (in sec)
      double getIniPos()
      Returns the object's initial position (in meters)

      Returns the object's initial velocity (in m/s)

      • GravityCalc

        public GravityCalc(double fallTime,
                   double iniPos,
                   double iniVel)
        convenience constructor
        Parameters:
        fallTime - time (in seconds) that the object is in free fall
        iniPos - initial position of object (in meters)
        iniVel - initial velocity of object (in meters per second)
